For your stay during the Scalar Conference, we recommend the following hotels:

IBIS Stare Miasto

In the centre of the Old Town, the best location, only 15 minutes walk to the venue of the conference.

Hotel Golden Tulip
Hotel Campanille
Hotel Premiere Classe

Other options in a very good location:

Radisson Blu Centrum Hotel, ul. Grzybowska 24

Hotel Westin, Aleja Jana Pawła II 21

Hostel OKIDOKI, plac Dąbrowskiego 3

ElHostel, ul. Smocza 1
